item.title: I AM KINDNESS- Mount Olivet Surprise Makeovers
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=161&v=Lvzv7_JQbnQ I AM KINDNESS- Mount Olivet Surprise Makeovers Sarah Edwards Published on Apr 24, 2013 SUBSCRIBE 27 www.iamsarahedwards.com I AM KINDNESS is group of volunteers that perform random acts of kindess throughout the city; sparking inspiration, promoting goodwill and spreading more smiles. This is was their first outing at Mount Olivet Senior Care Center. It was an amazing success. Directed by Jason Ho Color graded by Dave Sweet
